metadata.title: CVE-2017-11102 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
The ReadOneJNGImage function in coders/png.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash)during JNG reading via a zero-length color_image data structure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11102` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.26-2
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.26-2
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.26-2
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.26-2
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.26-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.26-2').
